main event: A civilian reported seeing a white, spindle-shaped object that hovered at around 1,000 feet altitude and then ascended rapidly in San Mateo, California.
interesting points: The object ascended vertically at a very high rate of speed and disappeared above the cloud cover.
The sighting was observed by the civilian and one other witness (a corporal).
The estimated speed of the object was around 1,800 mph.
The report was submitted by Captain Pierson of the USAF at Barcus AES Base, California.
